faqs.q: What’s the best time to visit?
faqs.a: Year‑round is pleasant. Dry months are typically May–September; brief showers are common anytime.
Warm tropical climate: daytime 24–31°C (75–88°F). Evenings are comfortable.
City buses run 5 a.m.–11 p.m.; taxis and rides are available late; rentals and bikes are common.

faqs.q: Can I swim at the beaches?
faqs.a: Yes, many are swimmable. Observe flags and lifeguard guidance; wear reef‑safe sunscreen.
Tipping 10–15% is appreciated in restaurants and for drivers/guides when service is good.

faqs.q: Will I have mobile data and Wi‑Fi?
faqs.a: Wi‑Fi is common in hotels/cafes. Local SIMs and eSIMs are available; coverage is best in the city.
